headline: Wall Street Lunch: June CPI Shows Tariff Impact On Prices
summary: A mixed retail inflation report indicated that tariffs are starting to have upward pressure on prices.

headline: Workato Completes Workday Certified Integration for Salesforce CRM and CPQ
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., July 15, 2025--Workato®, the leader in agentic orchestration, has received Workday Certified Integration badges for its Salesforce CRM and CPQ accelerators. The packaged solutions, which offer pre-built workflows and documentation, help customers go-live faster with easier customization and lower total cost of ownership. Specifically, the CPQ accelerator addresses eight core Opportunity-to-Cash use cases (New Orders, Renewals, Cancellations, Add-ons, Co-terminations, Upgrades,

headline: Workday: 4 Reasons The New S&P 500 Addition Is Expected To Outperform
summary: Workday's unique 'system of record' and deep enterprise integration position it for significant AI-driven value creation and workflow enhancement.

headline: Compa Completes Workday Certified Integration, Giving Workday Customers Access to Real-Time Compensation Data
summary: NEWPORT BEACH, Calif., July 15, 2025--Compa, a compensation intelligence company with the largest network for real-time offer and employee market data, announces it has achieved Certified integration status with Workday. Available in the Workday Marketplace, Workday’s Human Capital Management system (HCM) connects directly to Compa, giving customers access to real-time employee benchmarks and stock data based on offers and employee records.
